Class ScoreDiffMancalaNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameNode
      • MancalaNode
        • ScoreDiffMancalaNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ScoreDiffMancalaNode
extends MancalaNode
    An extension of MancalaNode with a simple, score-difference utility evaluation function.

        public double utility()
        Return the difference between current MAX and MIN score.
        Specified by:
        utility in class MancalaNode
        Returns:
        double an estimation of game node utility, unless game is over. If game is over, return actual utility.
